CraftData.Description: The solar panel collects a modest amount of energy from natural sunlight during the day powering adjacent machines. Requires sky clearance.
CraftData.Hint: Great for topping off low-power devices

CraftData.Description: The solar panel collects a modest amount of energy from natural sunlight during the day powering adjacent machines. Requires sky clearance.
CraftData.Hint: Requires sky clearance!

CraftData.Description: Collects a medium amount of energy during the day. Can only be placed in a flat 3x3 configuration on top of the research lab, refinery or large power storage units.
CraftData.Hint: Can only be placed on Lab, Refineries and large Batteries!

CraftData.Description: Collects a medium amount of energy during the day and a minimal amount at night. This has the same placement restrictions as the regular version.
CraftData.Hint: Can only be placed on Lab, Refineries and large Batteries!

CraftData.Description: Burns resources in attached Hopper to power adjacent machines. Loses efficiency with depth due to poor ventilation. Use Laser Power Transmitters to send power deeper.
CraftData.Hint: Must be connected to a Storage Hopper

CraftData.Description: Transmits power at a very low rate from a generator or battery. Can power a machine, battery or another transmitter. Attach to a wall to send power vertically.
CraftData.Hint: Maximum range : 32. Upgrade as soon as possible.

CraftData.Description: Transmits power at a low rate from a generator or battery up to 64m. Can power a machine, battery or another transmitter. Attach to a wall to send power vertically.
CraftData.Hint: Maximum range : 64

CraftData.Description: Transmits power at a low rate from a generator or battery up to 64m. Can power a machine, battery or another transmitter. Attach to a wall to send power vertically.
CraftData.Hint: Perform up-crafts of your old gear in the SelfCraft (C) menu!

CraftData.Description: Transmits power at a medium rate from a generator or battery up to 64m. Can power a machine, battery or another transmitter. Attach to a wall to send power vertically.
CraftData.Hint: Tier 2 version transmits more power!

CraftData.Description: Transmits power at a medium rate from a generator or battery up to 64m. Can power a machine, battery or another transmitter. Attach to a wall to send power vertically.
CraftData.Hint: Perform up-crafts of your old gear in the SelfCraft (C) menu!

CraftData.Description: Transmits power at a high rate from a generator or battery up to 64m. Can power a machine, battery or another transmitter. Attach to a wall to send power vertically.
CraftData.Hint: The largest single-block energy transmitter.

CraftData.Description: Acts as a buffer between power generators and consumers by storing up to 200 power. Adjacent power storage blocks will share power.
CraftData.Hint: Connect to machines to power them

CraftData.Description: Acts as a buffer between power generators and consumers by storing up to 1,500 power. Adjacent power storage blocks will share power.
CraftData.Hint: Connect to machines to power them

CraftData.Description: Acts as a buffer between power generators and consumers by storing up to 5,000 power. Adjacent power storage blocks will share power.
CraftData.Hint: Connect to machines to power them

CraftData.Description: Acts as a buffer between power generators and consumers by storing up to 5,000 power. Adjacent power storage blocks will share power.
CraftData.Hint: Connect to machines to power them

CraftData.Description: A low-tech and easy-to-use way of transferring low power to many machines. Place in a 5x1x5 layout .
CraftData.Hint: Great for Missile Batteries, Booster Chargers and Resin Refinery setups!

CraftData.Description: A handy method of removing ores from your inventory. Place in a 3x3 layout, then stand on it! Requires a small amount of power and an attached Storage Hopper. (9 in total)
CraftData.Hint: No time for lazy!

CraftData.Description: A handy method of removing unwanted detritus from your inventory. Place in a 3x3 layout, then stand on it! Requires a small amount of power and an attached Storage Hopper. (9 in total)
CraftData.Hint: No time for lazy!

CraftData.Description: Automatically removes Bars from players when they leave the server. Very little use for single-player, but also works as an Ore Thief, but for bars! Place in a 3x3 layout. (9 in total)
CraftData.Hint: No time for lazy!

CraftData.Description: A handy method of removing unwanted organic parts from your inventory. Place in a 3x3 layout, then stand on it! Requires a small amount of power and an attached Storage Hopper. (9 in total)
CraftData.Hint: No time for lazy!

CraftData.Description: Automatically removes items from adjacent Storage Hoppers and transmits it to player within 5 metres.
CraftData.Hint: No time for lazy!

CraftData.Description: Automatically removes items from adjacent Storage Hoppers and transmits it to player within 5 metres - SUPER FAST! Requires Dapper DLC.
CraftData.Hint: No time for lazy!

CraftData.Description: Place this and give power to auto-generate a waypoint. Override the waypoint name by placing an adjacent sign.
CraftData.Hint: No time for lazy!

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 270,000 power and must be built in a 3x3x3 configuration (27 total).
CraftData.Hint: Double Density of T3 batteries!

CraftData.Description: Fires up to 10,000 PPS, equalising power between batteries. Do not look directly into beam.
CraftData.Hint: Do not stand directly in beam.

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 4.5 million power and must be built 9m tall with a 5x5 base (225 total). Will not accept power from adjacent power storage blocks.
CraftData.Hint: Quadruple Density of T3 batteries!

CraftData.Description: Acts as a buffer between power generators and consumers by storing up to 8,500 power. Adjacent power storage blocks will share power.
CraftData.Hint: Slow throughput, large capacity. Slightly creepy audio.

CraftData.Description: Automatically extracts ore from the vein it is attached to. Internal storage capacity can be extended with a Storage Hopper. Requires power. Can be upgraded.
CraftData.Hint: Upgrading Motors and Drill Heads is more efficient than building more Ore Extractors.

CraftData.Description: Entry level storage solution. Stores up to 10 resources but transfers very slowly.
CraftData.Hint: Disperses resources very slowly.

CraftData.Description: Entry level storage solution. Stores up to 2 resources but transfers faster than a mini-hopper. Fast enough for a basic ore extractor. Consider using in parallel.
CraftData.Hint: Disperses resources fairly quickly.

CraftData.Description: Entry level storage solution. Stores up to 10 resources but transfers very slowly.
CraftData.Hint: Disperses resources very slowly.

CraftData.Description: Entry level storage solution. Stores up to 2 resources but transfers faster than a mini-hopper. Fast enough for a basic ore extractor. Consider using in parallel.
CraftData.Hint: Disperses resources fairly quickly.

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 100 resources and transfers quickly. Use to automate other machines. Set permissions appropriately to ensure correct material flow. See handbook entry.
CraftData.Hint: Can be connected to other machines for automation.

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 100 resources and transfers quickly. Use to automate other machines. Set permissions appropriately to ensure correct material flow. See handbook entry.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to get rid of your old rubbish hoppers!

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 100 resources and transfers quickly. Use to automate other machines. Only outputs in one direction.
CraftData.Hint: Use for compact setups!

CraftData.Description: Use this to craft generic plug-in modules to upgrade many low-tier machines into higher tiers from Tin PCBs.
CraftData.Hint: Many machines use these for upgrading tiers.

CraftData.Description:
Low grade heating and lighting.
Use this to keep your base warm.
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Fire is hot!

CraftData.Description:
Low grade heating and lighting.
Also available in the Self-Crafting menu (C)
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Fire is hot!

CraftData.Description: Provides a cold blue light, and requires power.
CraftData.Hint: This casts light in a 180 degree arc

CraftData.Description: Attach to any power-consuming machine for an audio warning if out of power.
CraftData.Hint: They can also be used on Conveyor Belts and Storage Hoppers.

CraftData.Description: Attach to any power-consuming machine for an red glowing light.
CraftData.Hint: Try not to place too many. It can be annoying.

CraftData.Description: Attach to any power-consuming machine for a strobe warning if out of power.
CraftData.Hint: Try not to place too many. It can be annoying.

CraftData.Description: Attach to any power-consuming machine for a strobe warning if out of power.
CraftData.Hint: Try not to place too many. It can be annoying.

CraftData.Description: Use this to remind yourself exactly what you meant to do.
CraftData.Hint: Thank you to the Patreons for donating to get this live!

CraftData.Description: A slightly stronger wall for your base.
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 8 Paste!

CraftData.Description: A slightly stronger wall for your base.
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 4 Paste!

CraftData.Description: A weak window, has wooden frames
CraftData.Hint: Caution : Uses up 4 Paste!

CraftData.Description: Useful for looking into the guts of your base
CraftData.Hint: It's seethrough!

CraftData.Description: Thank you to Ogspokes for going above and beyond in support of this game. Want to help? www.patreon.com/FortressCraft
CraftData.Hint: Paintable, reinforced window. Not recommended for use in Rooms.

CraftData.Description: OSHA Guidelines state that Red and White Chevrons are used to for Fire Prevention equipment.
CraftData.Hint: Marks Hazards

CraftData.Description: OSHA Guidelines state that Yellow and Black Chevrons are used to mark Physical Hazards.
CraftData.Hint: Marks Hazards

CraftData.Description: OSHA Guidelines state that White and Black Chevrons are used to mark Aisles.
CraftData.Hint: Marks Hazards

CraftData.Description: OSHA Guidelines state that White and Blue Chevrons are used to mark Defective Machinery.
CraftData.Hint: Marks Hazards

CraftData.Description: OSHA Guidelines state that White and Green Chevrons are used to mark Safety and First Aid Machinery.
CraftData.Hint: Marks Hazards

CraftData.Description: OSHA Guidelines state that Yellow and Pink Chevrons are used to mark Radioactive Areas. Did you know Laser are radioactive?
CraftData.Hint: Marks Hazards

CraftData.Description: OSHA Guidelines state that White and Orange Chevrons are used to mark off areas with dangerous Traffic.
CraftData.Hint: Marks Hazards

CraftData.Description: Decorative wooden blocks
CraftData.Hint: Pretty!

CraftData.Description: Decorative wooden blocks. This can also be crafted under the self-craft menu (C)
CraftData.Hint: Pretty!

CraftData.Description: White canvas, can be painted using the paint gun (N).
CraftData.Hint: Caution: Uses up 1 Rough Hewn Rock!

CraftData.Description: Red canvas for decorating our base.
CraftData.Hint: Caution: Uses up 1 Rough Hewn Rock!

CraftData.Description: Blue canvas for decorating our base
CraftData.Hint: Caution: Uses up 1 RoughHewnRock!

CraftData.Description: Green canvas for decorating our base
CraftData.Hint: Caution: Uses up 1 RoughHewnRock!

CraftData.Description: Smelts ore into bars. Can be operated manually or automated using input and output Storage Hoppers. See the handbook for more information. Can be upgraded.
CraftData.Hint: T2 item - use the one at your base to start with!

CraftData.Description: Smelts ore into bars. Double the speed of a regular smelter, but less efficient. If you have too much Ore, but not enough Bars, this is the perfect solution. Cannot be upgraded with Forced Induction modules. See the handbook for more information.
CraftData.Hint: Upgrade to a regular Ore Smelter as soon as possible.

CraftData.Description: Place on top of a regular smelter to increase speed by 200% but power usage by 800%. Does not support basic smelters.
CraftData.Hint: Power Usage increased by 8x

CraftData.Description: Place on top of a regular smelter to increase speed by 300% but power usage by 1,600%. Does not support basic smelters.
CraftData.Hint: Power Usage increased by 16x

CraftData.Description: Place on top of a regular smelter to increase speed by 400% but power usage by 3,200%. Does not support basic smelters.
CraftData.Hint: Power Usage increased by 32x

CraftData.Description: Place on top of a regular smelter to increase speed by 400% but power usage by 3,200%. Increases Smelter collection rate by 2x!
CraftData.Hint: This doubles the collection rate of the Smelter.

CraftData.Description: Place on top of a regular smelter to increase speed by 400% but power usage by 3,200%. Increases Smelter collection rate by 4x!
CraftData.Hint: This doubles the collection rate of the Smelter.

CraftData.Description: Place on top of a regular smelter to allow smelting of T4 ores. DECREASES speed by 400%. Power increase usage : Unknown.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to build your first Continuous Casting Basin.

CraftData.Description: Basic energy-based defence. Range of 16m. Requires power.
CraftData.Hint: Do not place on top of your Ore Smelter!

CraftData.Description: Basic energy-based defence. Range of 20m, improved damage. Requires power.
CraftData.Hint: Place on top of your Ore Smelter if you want.

CraftData.Description: Long-range energy-based defence. Range of 72m. Slow firing but high damage. Requires power.
CraftData.Hint: Upgrade your MK2 turrets to this with rewards from the waves.

CraftData.Description: Medium-range, high damage, energy-based defence. Range of 64m. 27 needed in total.
CraftData.Hint: Upgrade your MK3 turrets to this with rewards from the waves.

CraftData.Description: High damage missile defense system. Will only target large enemies. Ammunition must be manufactured and stored in an adjacent Storage Hopper. Has a minimum range of 64m.
CraftData.Hint: Needs Missiles crafted for it.

CraftData.Description: Provides an early warning system. Estimates the threat generated by your base and time until next attack.
CraftData.Hint: Use multiples to triangualate the source of danger.

CraftData.Description: Allows a REALLY OBVIOUS way of reminding yourself how long before an attack.
CraftData.Hint: Subtle is no good. Subtle is dead!

CraftData.Description: Provides an early warning report on nearby growing Hardened Resin clusters.
CraftData.Hint: Doesn't need power; just check on it once in a while!

CraftData.Description: Uses Rotting organic parts to attract nearby lifeforms.
CraftData.Hint: Useful for traps.

CraftData.Description: Allows you to monitor the server. Also gives readouts about permissions and other fun things.
CraftData.Hint: Sorry about your 4th wall.

CraftData.Description: Uses a small amount of power to reduce your base's threat. Use this for a respite from attacks whilst you develop your base.
CraftData.Hint: STOP USING THESE. REMOVED IN NEXT PATCH. !

CraftData.Description: Uses a modest amount of power to increase your base's threat. Use this to obtain more Organic Loot!
CraftData.Hint: Each one increases threat by 10% and adds 5 mobs per wave

CraftData.Description: Slow but cheap method of transferring materials between Storage Hoppers. No power required. It is recommend to automate crafting of these for efficiency.
CraftData.Hint: Use the Automated Crafter for more efficiency.

CraftData.Description: Used for transferring materials between Storage Hoppers. No power required. Open conveyors are susceptible to attack and extreme temperatures.
CraftData.Hint: Use the Automated Crafter for more efficiency.

CraftData.Description: Use this to upgrade your old starting conveyors into something more useful.
CraftData.Hint: Automation is always more efficient

CraftData.Description: Used to transport items up slopes. Almost twice as fast as a conveyor belt. Thanks Pythagoras!
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Used to transport items down slopes. Almost twice as fast as a conveyor belt. Thanks Pythagoras!
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert Downslopes to Upslopes.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert Upslopes to Downslopes.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert straight conveyors into CCW corners.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert straight conveyors into CW corners.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert CW Corners into CCW corners.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert CCW Corners into CW corners.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert a Straight Conveyor into a Corner Conveyor.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert Basic Conveyor Belts into Basic CCW corners.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert Basic Conveyor Belts into Basic CW corners.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert Basic CW Corners into Basic CCW corners.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert Basic CCW Corners into Basic CW corners.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Convert a Straight Conveyor into a Corner Conveyor.
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Used to transport items up slopes. Almost twice as fast as a conveyor belt. Thanks Pythagoras!
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Used to transport items down slopes. Almost twice as fast as a conveyor belt. Thanks Pythagoras!
CraftData.Hint: Vulnerable to extreme cold!

CraftData.Description: Automatically rotates after transferring items. Avoid placing adjacent to Storage Hoppers or other turntables. Use to split conveyor lines.
CraftData.Hint: Use to split conveyor lines

CraftData.Description: Attach to a Storage Hopper to allow types of material entering the conveyor network.
CraftData.Hint: Place between hoppers and conveyors

CraftData.Description: Attach to a Storage Hopper to insert specific materials to your logistics network.
CraftData.Hint: Allows specific item support.

CraftData.Description: Attach to a Storage Hopper and give power to saturate the fastest of transport systems!
CraftData.Hint: Needs 5 power per item. Face away from the Storage Hopper.

CraftData.Description: Combines 2 lines into 1 with a guaranteed 50:50 ratio.
CraftData.Hint: Connect directly to conveyor belts. Only works if both sides are supplied with material.

CraftData.Description: Rapidly combines 2 lines into 1 with a guaranteed 50:50 ratio. Much faster than a standard Zipper Merge.
CraftData.Hint: Connect directly to conveyor belts. Only works if both sides are supplied with material.

CraftData.Description: Rapidly combines 2 lines into 1 in the order RRR L. Use this to make Research Pod assembly a doddle!
CraftData.Hint: Connect directly to conveyor belts. Only works if both sides are supplied with material.

CraftData.Description: Sends all incoming items Right, unless blocked, then Left.
CraftData.Hint: Connect directly to conveyor belts or Hoppers. Only works correctly if both sides have an output.

CraftData.Description: Fast but expensive method of transferring materials between Storage Hoppers. No power required. Unaffected by extreme cold and less susceptible to attack.
CraftData.Hint: Immune to extreme cold.

CraftData.Description: Attach to a Storage Hopper to limit the type of material entering a transport pipe network.
CraftData.Hint: Can be used on walls and ceilings

CraftData.Description: Beams a resources from an attached Storage Hopper to another up to 64m away. Requires line of sight. Place on a wall to transmit vertically. Peak Performance : 150/min
CraftData.Hint: Rapid Transfer, high Energy cost

CraftData.Description: Beams resources from an attached Storage Hopper to another up to 32m away, 2 at a time. Peak Performance : 300/min
CraftData.Hint: Rapid Transfer, high Energy cost

CraftData.Description: Beams resources from an attached Storage Hopper to another up to 16m away, 4 at a time. Peak Performance : 600/min
CraftData.Hint: Rapid Transfer, high Energy cost

CraftData.Description: Beams resources from an attached Storage Hopper to another up to 8m away, 32 at a time. Peak Performance : 4800/min.
CraftData.Hint: Rapid Transfer, high Energy cost

CraftData.Description:
Automatically moves resources between hoppers based on hopper permissions.
Cheap and nasty, but reliable* *Not that reliable really.
CraftData.Hint: Cheap and nasty, but reliable* *Not that reliable really.

CraftData.Description: Mark off a 32m area for FALCORs to automatically collect loot from. Requires power.
CraftData.Hint: Ideal for Wasp drops!

CraftData.Description: Automatically collects marked loot from FALCOR Beacons within 256m. Requires attached Storage Hopper.
CraftData.Hint: Ideal for Wasp drops!

CraftData.Description: Automatically collects items from FALCOR Beacons mounted on Storage Hoppers.
CraftData.Hint: Ideal for low-throughput, long-distance logistics.

CraftData.Description: Collects nearby outdoor unharvested Plants and returns them. Requires attached Storage Hopper.
CraftData.Hint: Also good for framerate!

CraftData.Description: Automatically collects marked loot from FALCOR Beacons mounted on SpiderBot. Requires attached Storage Hopper.
CraftData.Hint: Ideal for Wasp drops!

CraftData.Description: Automatically delivers CryoBombs to distant CryoPlasm.
CraftData.Hint: Bombs need to be in attached Storage Hoppers.

CraftData.Description: Auto-crafts CryoBombs.
CraftData.Hint: Bombs need to be in attached Storage Hoppers.

CraftData.Description: Conveyor-based machine for automatically converting Bars into plates. Does not require external power.
CraftData.Hint: A useful start when automating

CraftData.Description: Conveyor-based machine for automatically upcrafting Basic Conveyors into faster Conveyors Belts. This is best configured with 3x hoppers for input, and 1x Conveyor belt for the output.
CraftData.Hint: Automated Crafting is more efficient than hand-crafting.

CraftData.Description: Conveyor-based machine for automatically converting Bars into plates. Does not require external power or Hoppers.
CraftData.Hint: A useful start when automating

CraftData.Description: Conveyor based machine for automatically converting metal bars into wires. Does not require external power or Storage Hoppers.
CraftData.Hint: A useful start when automating

CraftData.Description: Conveyor based machine for automatically converting metal wires into coils. Does not require external power or Storage Hoppers.
CraftData.Hint: A useful start when automating

CraftData.Description: Conveyor based machine for automatically converting metal coils into PCBs. Does not require external power or Storage Hoppers.
CraftData.Hint: PCBs are used in many electronic components

CraftData.Description: A machine that supports autocrafting of Iron Plates into Iron Gears.
CraftData.Hint: Much more efficient than doing it by hand!

CraftData.Description: A machine that supports autocrafting of Copper Wires into Servo Motors.
CraftData.Hint: Much more efficient than doing it by hand!

CraftData.Description: A machine that supports autocrafting of Tin Plates into Lightweight Machine Housings.
CraftData.Hint: Much more efficient than doing it by hand!

CraftData.Description: A machine that supports autocrafting of Gold Wire into useful Gold Foil.
CraftData.Hint: Don't think about it too much.

CraftData.Description: A machine that supports autocrafting of Titanium Plates into Titanium Machine Housings.
CraftData.Hint: Much more efficient than doing it by hand!

CraftData.Description: Use this to craft advanced plug-in modules to upgrade many mid-tier machines into higher tiers from Nickel PCBs.
CraftData.Hint: Many machines use these for upgrading tiers.

CraftData.Description: Use this to craft Alloyed plug-in modules.
CraftData.Hint: Use these to progress to higher tiers of machines.

CraftData.Description: Use this to craft the Ultimate plug-in modules.
CraftData.Hint: Use these to progress to the highest tier of machine.

CraftData.Description: Uses a mixture of Nickel and Titanium to create essential Alloyed blocks.
CraftData.Hint: These are used extensively, and it is highly recommended you automate these!

CraftData.Description: Converts useless garbage into Construction Paste. All aesthetic blocks use construction paste!
CraftData.Hint: Pretty.

CraftData.Description: Converts useless garbage and Coal into Construction Paste. All aesthetic blocks use construction paste!
CraftData.Hint: Only works if you have the Dapper Indie Supporter DLC.

CraftData.Description: Gold-plates Hardened Blocks into Alloyed Blocks.
CraftData.Hint: These are used extensively, and it is highly recommended you automate these!

CraftData.Description: Crafts Alloyed Blocks from T2 crafting Materials.
CraftData.Hint: These are used extensively, and it is highly recommended you automate these!

CraftData.Description: Conveyor based machine for automatically converting metal bars into pipes. Does not require external power or Storage Hoppers.
CraftData.Hint: A useful start when automating

CraftData.Description: A simple way to create empty fuel canisters.
CraftData.Hint: Great for fuel!

CraftData.Description: Automatically manufactures empty missiles. Requires power and attached Storage Hoppers containing ingredients. Outputs missiles to an attached Storage Hopper.
CraftData.Hint: These missiles will need fuelling before they're useful!

CraftData.Description: Automatically fuels empty missiles. Requires power and attached Storage Hoppers containing ingredients. Outputs missiles to an attached Storage Hopper.
CraftData.Hint: These missiles are ready to launch!

CraftData.Description: Adds Armorpiercing Warheads to missiles
CraftData.Hint: Just to get that extra Punch you need

CraftData.Description: Takes Basic Missiles and 50,000 energy to imbue with even more energy.
CraftData.Hint: These missiles are ready to launch!

CraftData.Description: Turns a single Imbued Missile and turns it into 8 rapid-fire missiles, each doing 1/4 of the original damage, for a total of double the damage.
CraftData.Hint: These missiles are ready to launch!

CraftData.Description: Takes Imbued Missiles and adds 50% damage-over-time.
CraftData.Hint: These missiles are ready to launch!

CraftData.Description: Takes Imbued Missiles and adds a massive slowing effect.
CraftData.Hint: These missiles are ready to launch!

CraftData.Description: Imbues Lithium Coils with Energy. Feed into the SpiderBot Upgrade and Recharge Dock via a Storage Hopper.
CraftData.Hint: SpiderBot needs energy to defend your base with.

CraftData.Description: Uses large amounts of energy to Ablate the surface of Hardened Resin, allowing it to be liquified and then refined.
CraftData.Hint: Excellent for clearing out dead hiveminds for useful material.

CraftData.Description: Uses large amounts of energy to access the soft core of a Hardened Resin block, once it's been Ablated. Attach to a storage hopper.
CraftData.Hint: Excellent for clearing out dead hiveminds for useful material.

CraftData.Description: Converts Liquid Resin into the extremely useful Refined Liquid Resin.
CraftData.Hint: Used in a number of high-end organic recipes.

CraftData.Description: Electrifies Brains from destroyed hives to cause nearby Hiveminds to grow. The more energy, the faster they grow.
CraftData.Hint: You can use multiple Agitators to your imminent regret.

CraftData.Description: Upgrade module for the Manufacturing Plant, allows the manufacture of suit upgrades. Must be placed on top of the Manufacturing Plant.
CraftData.Hint: This MUST be placed on top of your Manufacturing Plant.

CraftData.Description: Increases the efficiency of your suit's solar panels. Only one required and must be carried in inventory. Requires Hydrojet Cutter to manufacture.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1! May only be crafted if the Hydrojet Cutter is present.

CraftData.Description: Increases suit heating power protecting you from extreme cold. Only one required and must be carried in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1.

CraftData.Description: Doubles your suit's power capacity. Only one required and must be carried in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1! May only be crafted if the Hydrojet Cutter is present.

CraftData.Description: Quadruples your suit's power capacity. Only one required and must be carried in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: Converts ALL previous suit upgrades into an super-duper All In One (tm) Suit Upgrade. Perfick.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: Reduces the power drain of your suit's headlamp. Only one required and must be carried in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1

CraftData.Description: This will allow you to gently scratch the local life forms, but may be useful to clear weak, defenseless creatures. Press V to select.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: Can dig through more materials than your starting build gun. Can dismantle Ore Smelters and Manufacturing Plants.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: This bad boy can cut through hard ores AND remove large areas in a single action..
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: Crafting this allows your suit to filter out dangerous and hallucinogenic toxins from the atmosphere.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to progress past the poison-spore filled caves

CraftData.Description: Very obvious when dropped. Designed for Boy Scouts in Clumsy Mode.
CraftData.Hint: #AlwaysBePrepared

CraftData.Description: This will let you see the closest Crystal when Pinging. Press M to select.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: This will let you see ALL Crystals when Pinging! Press M to select.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: Allows the use of jet thrust to fly over short ranges. Uses large amounts of power. Activate with 'J'.
CraftData.Hint: Suit Item! You only need 1!

CraftData.Description: A single one of these will be able to upgrade, repair and re-arm your SpiderBot. Build in a 15x15 square. Requires 225 in total.
CraftData.Hint: Setting up an assembly line for the SpiderBot Core Charger will make your life much easier!

CraftData.Description: Rapid fire, low-slung energy-based weapon. Ideal for small to medium targets.
CraftData.Hint: Once constructed, place in a hopper adjacent to the SpiderBot Upgrade Dock.

CraftData.Description: Slow-firing, powerful area damage cannons. Capable of targeting high and low; specialises in medium targets.
CraftData.Hint: Once constructed, place in a hopper adjacent to the SpiderBot Upgrade Dock.

CraftData.Description: Rapid fire, shoulder-mounted energy weapon. Ideal for taking down the very largest of attackers.
CraftData.Hint: Once constructed, place in a hopper adjacent to the SpiderBot Upgrade Dock.

CraftData.Description: A simple wooden crate that can store a small amount of items. Cannot be automated. Multiple crates can be connected together to increase storage space.
CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Description: A simple wooden crate that can store a small amount of items. Cannot be automated. Multiple crates can be connected together to increase storage space.
CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Description: A simple wooden crate that can store a small amount of items. Cannot be automated. Multiple crates can be connected together to increase storage space.
CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Description: A simple wooden crate that can store a small amount of items. Cannot be automated. Multiple crates can be connected together to increase storage space.
CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Description: A simple wooden crate that can store a small amount of items. Cannot be automated. Multiple crates can be connected together to increase storage space.
CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Description: A simple wooden crate that can store a small amount of items. Cannot be automated. Multiple crates can be connected together to increase storage space.
CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Description: A simple wooden crate that can store a small amount of items. Cannot be automated. Multiple crates can be connected together to increase storage space.
CraftData.Hint: Connect multiple crates together to increase available inventory space.

CraftData.Description: Use to create Steel Bars.
CraftData.Hint: Automation is king!

CraftData.Description: Common component for advanced machinery.
CraftData.Hint: Can also be used for construction.

CraftData.Description: Common component for advanced machinery. Uses 4 Advanced Machine Blocks and a single MK5 Power Booster.
CraftData.Hint: Can also be used for construction.

CraftData.Description: Common component for advanced machinery.
CraftData.Hint: Can also be used for construction.

CraftData.Description: Common component for advanced machinery.
CraftData.Hint: Can also be used for construction.

CraftData.Description: Common component for advanced machinery.
CraftData.Hint: Can also be used for construction.

CraftData.Description: Process Biomass into useful products. Must be attached to a Refinery Reactor Vat to operate. See the handbook for more information.
CraftData.Hint: Must be connected to a Refinery Reactor Vat to operate.

CraftData.Description: Refinery Reactor Vat component. Must be built in a 3x3x3 configuration (27 total). Requires an attached Refinery Controller.
CraftData.Hint: Place in a 3 by 3 by 3 configuration to form a valid Reactor Vat.

CraftData.Description: Housing component for a Jet Turbine Generator. Build 3 high with a 4x3 base (36 in total). Attach intake to define the front.
CraftData.Hint: Build in a 4 by 3 horizontal shape, and build 3 high. Attach an intake to form the front of the machine.

CraftData.Description: Sucks in large amounts of air for the turbine. Place in front of the housing 3m high and 3m wide.
CraftData.Hint: The Turbine Generator intake is placed at the front of the housing in a 3 by 3 vertical shape.

CraftData.Description: Fixes the damage to ARTHER allowing him to move reliably. Only one required and must be carried in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Allows ARTHER to move reliably again. You need to keep 1 in your inventory.

CraftData.Description: Allows ARTHER to hold 8x more charge which he can transfer to you when you run low. Only one required and must be carried in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Allows ARTHER to collect more power

CraftData.Description: Improves the rate at which ARTHER regenerates power from sunlight. Only one required and must be carried in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Allows ARTHER to collect power faster

CraftData.Description: Gives the effect of the Solar Panel, Core and Battery. Use this to save inventory space.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to save room in your inventory.

CraftData.Description: Insert 'moustache ride' joke here. Only works if you have the Dapper Indie Supporter DLC.
CraftData.Hint: Only works if you have the Dapper Indie Supporter DLC.

CraftData.Description: Keep ARTHER looking Dapper AND dry! Only works if you have the Dapper Indie Supporter DLC.
CraftData.Hint: Only works if you have the Dapper Indie Supporter DLC.

CraftData.Description: Improves ARTHER vision! Only works if you have the Dapper Indie Supporter DLC.
CraftData.Hint: Only works if you have the Dapper Indie Supporter DLC.

CraftData.Description: Fully Dapper! Use this to save room in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to save room in your inventory.

CraftData.Description: Fully Upgraded - Fully Dapper! Use this to save room in your inventory.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to save room in your inventory.

CraftData.Description: Allows ARTHER to charge rapidly! Requires Power.
CraftData.Hint: This is awesome. Use it.

CraftData.Description: Remember those baubleberries you macerated? You'll want some of those.
CraftData.Hint: Dooo-OOOOO-ooooot!

CraftData.Description: Uses Orange Glow pods to provide a nice orange glow.
CraftData.Hint: Oooo-OOOOO-ooooo!

CraftData.Description: Take one of each of the other masks create the ultimate ghost mask!
CraftData.Hint: Dootdoot.

CraftData.Description: Uses Green Glow pods to provide a nice green glow.
CraftData.Hint: Dooo-OOOOO-ooooot!

CraftData.Description: He knows when you've been naughty, but, you bought the Dapper DLC, so clearly you're nice!.
CraftData.Hint: Now I have a machine gun. Ho. Ho. Ho.

CraftData.Description: WHAT TERROR LURKS BENEATH THE CLOTH OF DOOM???
CraftData.Hint: Answer : It's ARTHER.

CraftData.Description: Defensive turret which will only operate when manned by ARTHER. High range of 64m and low power requirement. Ideal for early conveyor defense!
CraftData.Hint: This is an ideal device to cover 128m of conveyors. Hint hint.

CraftData.Description: Allows clearing of CryoPlasm at a very short range. Useful for keeping stray tendrils at bay.
CraftData.Hint: This is a basic turret; use it in conjunction with more advanced weaponry.

CraftData.Description: Allows rapid melting of CryoPlasm into fluid form at a medium range. Useful for guiding CryoPlasm into killboxes.
CraftData.Hint: Excellent when paired with a Dazzler turret.

CraftData.Description: Automatically-detonating Chlorine Mines allow you to keep areas clear of CryoPlasm.
CraftData.Hint: Don't. Breath. It. In. Ok?

CraftData.Description: Allows clearing of CryoPlasm at a very long range. Useful for reducing the central bulk of the attacks.
CraftData.Hint: Build in a 3x3x3 layout.

CraftData.Description: Provides a useful real-time map for analysing and planning our defence. Build in a 3x3 layout. (9 in total)
CraftData.Hint: Build this to eliminate terrifying surprises.

CraftData.Description: Insert into an ore extractor to improve collection speed to 200% at the cost of increased power usage.
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 200%. Uses up a lot more power!

CraftData.Description: Insert into an ore extractor to improve collection speed to 400% at the cost of increased power usage.
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 400%

CraftData.Description: Insert into an ore extractor to improve collection speed to 800% at the cost of increased power usage.
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 800%

CraftData.Description: Insert into an ore extractor to improve collection speed to 1,600% at the cost of increased power usage.
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 1600%

CraftData.Description: Insert into an ore extractor to improve collection speed to 3,200% at the cost of increased power usage.
CraftData.Hint: Increases Ore Collection speed to 3200%

CraftData.Description: Insert into an ore extractor to improve efficiency to 20% reducing the amount of ore wasted. Wears out slowly. Also allows the harvesting of tougher materials.
CraftData.Hint: Higher efficiency means an extractor can last longer on an ore vein. It does not increase extraction speed.

CraftData.Description: Insert into an ore extractor to improve efficiency to 30% reducing the amount of ore wasted. Wears out quickly. Also allows the harvesting of tougher materials.
CraftData.Hint: The Crystal head is more efficient, but wears out quicker.

CraftData.Description: Insert into an ore extractor to improve efficiency to 50% reducing the amount of ore wasted. Wears out quickly. Also allows the harvesting of tougher materials.
CraftData.Hint: The Organic head is more efficient, but wears out quicker.

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 15 PPS.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 15 PPS

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 30 PPS.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 30 PPS

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 60 PPS.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 60 PPS

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 100 PPS.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 100 PPS

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 150%.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 150%

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 200%.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 200%

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 25%.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 25%

CraftData.Description: A greener, more renewable method of obtaining low-grade lenses.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 25%

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 100%.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 100%

CraftData.Description: Insert into a Laser Power Transmitter to increase speed by 250%.
CraftData.Hint: Increases laser transmission speed by 250%

CraftData.Description: Bevelled gear, used in various motors and joints. Automating this craft is more efficient than hand-crafting.
CraftData.Hint: Bevelled as it's quieter!

CraftData.Description: Empty fuel canister. Be green - recyle where possible!
CraftData.Hint: Be green - recyle after use!

CraftData.Description: Accurate and fast motor. Difficult to make by hand, easier to automate.
CraftData.Hint: Minimal torque.

CraftData.Description: A small metal box, used in lightweight objects. Automating this craft is more efficient than hand-crafting.
CraftData.Hint: Not to be used for heavy-duty machines!

CraftData.Description: An inefficient way of making these blocks. Automation can be more efficient than manually crafting. Hint hint.
CraftData.Hint: These are used extensively, and it is highly recommended you automate these!

CraftData.Description: An inefficient way of making these blocks. Automation can be more efficient than manually crafting. Hint hint.
CraftData.Hint: These are used extensively, and it is highly recommended you automate these!

CraftData.Description: Mass Storage Facility. Place on a horizontal plane. Use I/O ports to access the contents!
CraftData.Hint: Use Stocking Ports to limit the amount stored.

CraftData.Description: Inserts items from a conveyor into the Mass Storage Facility. Inserts 5 of the same item; pre-sorting can massively increase efficiency.
CraftData.Hint: Mothballed. Use Stocking Ports instead.

CraftData.Description: Inserts items from a conveyor into the Mass Storage Facility. Inserts 12 of the same item; pre-sorting can massively increase efficiency.
CraftData.Hint: Mothballed. Use Stocking Ports instead.

CraftData.Description: Inserts items from a conveyor into the Mass Storage Facility. Inserts 25 of the same item; pre-sorting can massively increase efficiency.
CraftData.Hint: Mothballed. Use Stocking Ports instead.

CraftData.Description: Stocks a specified quantity of an item in mass storage.
CraftData.Hint: Prevents clogging your mass storage crates with one item type!

CraftData.Description: Stocks a specified quantity of an item in mass storage.
CraftData.Hint: Prevents clogging your mass storage crates with one item type!

CraftData.Description: Stocks a specified quantity of an item in mass storage.
CraftData.Hint: Prevents clogging your mass storage crates with one item type!

CraftData.Description: Removes the specified type of item from the Mass Storage Facility. Removes 5 per trip.
CraftData.Hint: Unlimited Storage. Use I/O ports to access the contents!

CraftData.Description: Removes the specified type of item from the Mass Storage Facility. Removes 12 per trip.
CraftData.Hint: Unlimited Storage. Use I/O ports to access the contents!

CraftData.Description: Removes the specified type of item from the Mass Storage Facility. Removes 25 per trip.
CraftData.Hint: Unlimited Storage. Use I/O ports to access the contents!

CraftData.Description: Powers Mass Storage IO Ports.
CraftData.Hint: Unlimited Storage. Use I/O ports to access the contents!

CraftData.Description: Powered by Mass Storage Controller.
CraftData.Hint: Unlimited Storage. Use I/O ports to access the contents!

CraftData.Description: Macerator crushes and disposes of unwanted rock. Has a small chance to produce ore. Requires power and a Storage Hopper for any ore found.
CraftData.Hint: Has a small chance to produce ore.

CraftData.Description: Use this to dig a 3x3 shaft whilst you are busy doing more important things. Only digs upwards. Requires power.
CraftData.Hint: Does not affect ores unless on Rapid mode.

CraftData.Description: Automatically digs a 33m wide, 3m tall circle.
CraftData.Hint: Does not affect Ores

CraftData.Description: Automatically digs a 33m wide, 3m tall circle.
CraftData.Hint: Does affect ores.

CraftData.Description: Automatically and rapidly digs a 33m wide, 3m tall circle.
CraftData.Hint: Does affect ores.

CraftData.Description: Places items from attached Storage Hopper along cardinal directions. Why build your own conveyor lines when a machine can do it for you? Requires power.
CraftData.Hint: Why build your own conveyor lines when a machine can do it for you?

CraftData.Description: Upgrades existing Conveyor Lines to a higher tier. Requires power and attached storage hopper containing new conveyors. See handbook for more restrictions.
CraftData.Hint: A massive time-saver!

CraftData.Description: Manufacturing Plants allow automated crafting and building. Requires V2 Build Gun to move!
CraftData.Hint: Requires V2 Build Gun to move!

CraftData.Description: Basic Manufacturing Plants allow automated crafting to complete a manufacturing line.
CraftData.Hint: Does not support manual crafting.

CraftData.Description: Stores a location. Use in machines that require a target such as the teleporter. See the handbook for more information.
CraftData.Hint: Selecting the marker on your hotbar will show its stored location

CraftData.Description: Stores a location. Use in machines that require a target such as the teleporter. See the handbook for more information.
CraftData.Hint: Selecting the marker on your hotbar will show its stored location

CraftData.Description: Stores a location. Use in machines that require a target such as the teleporter. See the handbook for more information.
CraftData.Hint: Selecting the marker on your hotbar will show its stored location

CraftData.Description: Supply a location marker and enough power to allow teleporting. Jump while on top to activate.
CraftData.Hint: Jump on top of the device to activate!

CraftData.Description: A more elegant Teleportation system, allowing you to quickly and simply teleport between Advanced Teleporters.
CraftData.Hint: Press E to interface with this. Requires The Adventures Pack.

CraftData.Description: Supply power to increase explosion radius. Keeps charge when picked up. For safety we recommend you avoid charging near anything important.
CraftData.Hint: Requires charging with power before use!

CraftData.Description: A single-use machine, capable of destroying anything it's placed on. USE WITH EXTREME CARE.
CraftData.Hint: USE-WITH-EXTREME-CARE.

CraftData.Description: A consumable item that generates an ore ping without power cost. Combine with an Ore in the Self-Crafting (C) menu to create specific ore pings.
CraftData.Hint: Combine with an Ore in the Self-Crafting (C) menu to create specific ore pings.

CraftData.Description: A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Coal Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Iron Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Copper Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Tin Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Lithium Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Gold Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Nickel Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Titanium Ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show CrystalDeposit without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Biomass Growth without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Hardened Resin without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Chromium ore without power cost.
A consumable item that generates an ore ping that will only show Molybdenum ore without power cost.
Slow and efficient vertical transport. Can be upgraded using Lift Compressors.
CraftData.Hint: Can be upgraded using Lift Accelerators.

CraftData.Description: Attach to the base of the lift to allow manual control of the lift.
CraftData.Hint: Can be upgraded using Lift Accelerators.

CraftData.Description: Attach to the base of the lift to improve lift performance. Requires power.
CraftData.Hint: Can be upgraded using Lift Accelerators.

CraftData.Description: Slow and efficient vertical transport. Stand in it and press Space.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Frozen Factory DLC pack!

CraftData.Description: Slow and efficient vertical transport. Stand in it and press Space.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Dapper DLC pack!

CraftData.Description: Slow and efficient vertical transport. Stand in it and press Space.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Adventures DLC pack!

CraftData.Description: Copper-based housing.
CraftData.Hint: Use to house low-level items safely.

CraftData.Description: Automatically moves a specified item between conveyors.
CraftData.Hint: Use this for a straightforward Bussing system.

CraftData.Description: Automatically moves a specified item between conveyors.

CraftData.Description: Automatically moves a specified item between conveyors.
CraftData.Hint: Use this for the fastest Bussing system.

CraftData.Description: Gives a report on available resources beneath the surveyor. Use to determine the best place for your Quarry!
CraftData.Hint: Use to determine the best place for your Quarry!

CraftData.Description: Returns all resources found whilst excavating the shaft.
CraftData.Hint: Also returns all the dirt and rock...

CraftData.Description: Used to place Minecarts onto Tracks from an attached Storage Hopper.
CraftData.Hint: There is no hint for this.

CraftData.Description: Removes material from Minecarts into attached Storage Hoppers.
CraftData.Hint: Very fast!

CraftData.Description: Places material into Minecarts from attached Storage Hoppers.
CraftData.Hint: Very fast!

CraftData.Description: Crafts Straight ScrapTracks
Upcrafts Straight Minecart Tracks from older ScrapTracks.
Convert Corner to Straight

CraftData.Hint: You can do this anywhere!

CraftData.Description: A directional straight track piece.
A track piece that allows carts to travel multiple directions.
A simple straight track piece.
CraftData.Hint: Used for Mine Carts and Freight Carts

CraftData.Description: Allows Minecarts to go around corners. Can be rotated.
CraftData.Hint: Press R to rotate

CraftData.Description: Allows Minecarts to go up or down.
CraftData.Hint: Or down.

CraftData.Description: Speeds up Minecarts that pass over it. Doesn't require power today. May do so tomorrow.
CraftData.Hint: Very fast!

CraftData.Description: Minecarts hitting this will perform a 180 degree turn.
CraftData.Hint: Use for rail ends.

CraftData.Description: Minecarts following the RED arrow will turn around unless FULL. GREEN is freely passable.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to airlock minecarts where you want them.

CraftData.Description: Minecarts following the RED arrow will turn around unless EMPTY. GREEN is freely passable.
CraftData.Hint: Use this to airlock minecarts where you want them.

CraftData.Description: Slow Minecart with 25 Storage Capacity. Multiple minecarts can run on one track. Build as many as required.
CraftData.Hint: Upgrade these to higher versions when possible.

CraftData.Description: Fast Minecart with 25 Storage Capacity. Multiple minecarts can run on one track. Build as many as required.
CraftData.Hint: These are best when you have hilly terrain.

CraftData.Description: Slow Minecart with 50 Storage Capacity. Multiple minecarts can run on one track. Build as many as required.
CraftData.Hint: These are best when you have flat terrain.

CraftData.Description: Fast Minecart with 50 Storage Capacity.
CraftData.Hint: The best T4 can give!.

CraftData.Description: Fast Minecart with 50 Storage Capacity.
CraftData.Hint: The best T4 can give!

CraftData.Description: Super-Fast Minecart with 0 Storage Capacity.
CraftData.Hint: Press U to ride!

CraftData.Description: Low speed cart with limited capacity
CraftData.Hint: Gets items where they're needed... slowly

CraftData.Description: Low-speed cart with 50 capacity, designed for transporting ore.
CraftData.Hint: Gets Ore where it's needed.

CraftData.Description: Freight cart with 250 Ore Capacity.
CraftData.Hint: Can only carry one kind of ore at once.

CraftData.Description: Converts an Ore Freighter back into a Cargo Freighter.
CraftData.Hint: Only for upgrading your carts

CraftData.Description: Fast Freight cart with 250 Ore Capacity.
CraftData.Hint: Can only carry one kind of ore at once.

CraftData.Description: Converts an Ore Freighter back into a Cargo Freighter.

CraftData.Description: Converts an Ore Freighter back into a Cargo Freighter.
CraftData.Hint: Make up your mind!

CraftData.Description: Travel by way of Tour Cart Stations
CraftData.Hint: Functions only with Tour Cart Stations.

CraftData.Description: Supplies freight network with designated resources from hoppers or mass storage.
CraftData.Hint: Intelligent resource distribution!

CraftData.Description: Displays useful information about your freight system.
CraftData.Hint: See all the items!

CraftData.Description: Used to place Freight Carts onto Tracks from an attached Storage Hopper.
CraftData.Hint: Only launches carts to stations that need them.

A directional, low speed straight track piece for freight carts.
Convert Slope to Corner

CraftData.Description: Forces ConstructoBots to head in this direction.
ConstructoBots with cargo will head in the the direction of the GREEN arrow.
Full ConstructoBots will head in this direction.
Empty ConstructoBots will head in this direction.
ConstructoBots will alternate Left/Right on hitting this.
Sprays ConstructoBots a random colour (for now).
Sprays ConstructoBots with a material that allows operation in the Cold Caverns. Requires SOMETHING_COLD.
Fully-charges ConstructoBots. Requires Power.
Assembles Coppator ConstructoBot Chassis.
Assembles Tindron ConstructoBot Chassis.
Assembles Bronzite ConstructoBot Chassis.
Assembles Ironide ConstructoBot Chassis.
Assembles T0 Coppator ConstructoBot Legs.
Assembles T0 Coppator ConstructoBot Arms.
Assembles ConstructoBot Herb Arms.
Constructs a machine that can Construct ConstructoBots.
Build in a 3x1x3 shape above a 3x3 shaft to automatically deploy into a lift. 9 needed in total.
CraftData.Hint: Requires Power and RackRails..

CraftData.Description: Crafts Rack Rails from Iron Gears, used in the automation of Cargo Lift rails.
CraftData.Hint: Cargo Lifts are awesome.

CraftData.Description: Deploy in a Cargo Lift Controller. Affectionately referred to as Lifty McLiftFace.
CraftData.Hint: This isn't even the final form.

CraftData.Description: 1000 capacity lift with a maximum speed of 10 metres per second. Deploy in a Cargo Lift Controller.
CraftData.Hint: Can be upgraded later.

CraftData.Description: 3000 capacity lift with a maximum speed of 10 metres per second. Deploy in a Cargo Lift Controller.
CraftData.Hint: This is the best lift currently available.

CraftData.Description: Automatically assemble Research Pods. Requires power and attached Hoppers containing metal plates and PCBs. See handbook for more info.
CraftData.Hint: Use to unlock Projects!

CraftData.Description: Use this to transmit power to your Orbital Space station. Must be built 13 tall with a 9x9 base (1053 total).
CraftData.Hint: Once power has been beamed into orbit, it can be targeted down onto the surface in a controlled manner.

CraftData.Description: Use this to clear out surface attacks. Place near the enemy base.
CraftData.Hint: Only works if you have a fully-charged OET!

CraftData.Description: Use this to Research advanced Projects with Experiments. Must be built in a 3x3x3 configuration. (27 in total) See the handbook for more information on research.
CraftData.Hint: The Laboratory is built in a 3x3x3 shape.

CraftData.Description: A decorative metal truss
CraftData.Hint: Uses up Construction Paste!

CraftData.Description: Used in a number of useful recipes.
CraftData.Hint: Ruined Parts must be kept cold!

CraftData.Hint: Ruined Parts must be kept cold!

CraftData.Description: Used in a number of useful recipes.
CraftData.Hint: Ruined Parts must be kept cold!

CraftData.Description: Stores up to 50 resources. Uses power to keep stored items frozen. This can vastly extend the lifespan of Ruined Organic Parts.
CraftData.Hint: If placed somewhere cold, it requires much less power.

CraftData.Description: Feed 10x Ruined Organic Parts to this and receive a single Recombinated Organic Component.
CraftData.Hint: Recombinated Organic Components can be used to Self-Craft Pristine Organic Components.

CraftData.Description: Convert a Macerator using glands from Wasps and Slimes to give double the energy from burning coal. Requires no resources once built; just give it a little power!
CraftData.Hint: Gives a 2x gain in coal burning PPS.

CraftData.Description: Converts a Macerator using Crystal clocks to further enhance Enriched Coal with Crystal Deposits, doubling the energy output once again.
CraftData.Hint: Gives a 4x gain in coal burning PPS.

CraftData.Description: Uses large amounts of power to imbue standard Steel Cutter Heads with plasma-based energy.
CraftData.Hint: Gives a quadruple rate on the Ore Extractor, but the charge disappears after 2000 ore is returned.

CraftData.Description: The Cold Cavern Climate Control Centre should start to terraform the Cold Cavern we have found into a hospitable area. All T4 support machines will require this machine to work. 175 needed in total.
CraftData.Hint: Build in a 5w x 7h x5d configuration.

CraftData.Description: Forms the drill head of a Trencher Drill. Build in a 3wx3hx3d configuration in front of a motor.
CraftData.Hint: Very efficient on low tiers of ore. Inefficient on high tiers.

CraftData.Description: Forms the drill head of a Trencher Drill. Build in a 3wx3hx3d configuration in front of a motor.
CraftData.Hint: Very efficient on low tiers of ore. Less efficient on high tiers.

CraftData.Description: Forms the drill head of a Trencher Drill. Build in a 3wx3hx3d configuration in front of a motor.
CraftData.Hint: Very efficient on all tiers of ore.

CraftData.Description: Forms the motor of a Trencher Drill. Build in a 3wx3hx3d configuration behind a drill head.
CraftData.Hint: Accepts power and outputs ore for the drill.

CraftData.Description: Geothermal Power. Place in a cold area, and feed with Heat Conductant Pipes. Build in a 5x3x5 configuration. (75 total)
CraftData.Hint: Makes a lot of power.

CraftData.Description: This turns liquid metal into bars at a high rate. Capable of dealing with Chromium and Molybdenum. Build in a 5x3x5 configuration. (75 total)
CraftData.Hint: Attach to 4 Blast Furnaces for maximum efficiency.

CraftData.Description: This turns raw ore into liquid slag at a high rate. Capable of dealing with Chromium and Molybdenum. Build in a 3x7x3 configuration. (63 total)
CraftData.Hint: Use Pipes to connect this.

CraftData.Description: Use this to connect your Blast Furnaces to your Continuous Casting Basin. Can self-craft to bend.
CraftData.Hint: Use Pipes to connect this.

CraftData.Description: Conversion recipe. Craft these at the manufacturing plant.
CraftData.Hint: Use Pipes to connect this.

CraftData.Description: Use this to connect your Blast Furnaces to your Continuous Casting Basin. Can self-craft to straight.
CraftData.Hint: Use Pipes to connect this.

CraftData.Description: Conversion recipe. Craft these at the manufacturing plant.
CraftData.Hint: Use Pipes to connect this.

CraftData.Description: Crafts Crystal Fiber Mesh.
CraftData.Hint: No hint.

CraftData.Description: Crafts Heat Conducting Pipe, used in the GeoThermal Power Plant.
CraftData.Hint: No hint.

CraftData.Description: This will allow us to slowly and inefficiently grind T4 ores. With these new ore, we can build new machines! Build in a 3x1x3 configuration.
CraftData.Hint: SINGLE-USE MACHINE!

CraftData.Description: Removes useful particulates from the air. Build in a 5x3x5 configuration (75 total).
CraftData.Hint: Unlikely to make a long-term permanent difference to the air quality.

CraftData.Description: Compresses and cools low-pressure gas, ready to be stored then bottled. Build in a 3x3x3 configuration (27 total).
CraftData.Hint: This machine can have 4 Filtration Units attached to it.

CraftData.Description: Stores compressed gas, ready to be bottled. Build in a 3x7x3 configuration (63 total).
CraftData.Hint: This machine can have 4 Compressor Units attached to it.

CraftData.Description: Decants compressed gas into useful containers. Build in a 3x3x9 configuration (81 total).
CraftData.Hint: Any attached Storage Hoppers will receive the compressed gasses.

CraftData.Description: Conversion recipe. Craft these at the manufacturing plant.
CraftData.Hint: If it doesn't light up, it's probably in the wrong place!

CraftData.Description: Conversion recipe. Craft these at the manufacturing plant.
CraftData.Hint: If it doesn't light up, it's probably in the wrong place!

CraftData.Description: Used to connect various machines together. Can self-craft to bend.
CraftData.Hint: If it doesn't light up, it's probably in the wrong place!

CraftData.Description: Used to connect various machines together. Can self-craft to straight.
CraftData.Hint: If it doesn't light up, it's probably in the wrong place!

CraftData.Description: Digs a very, very, very big hole, then pours magma through it. Build in a 33x3x33 configuration. (3267 in total)
CraftData.Hint: Magma - better than it sounds.

CraftData.Description: Stores Magma and pumps it to a CryoPlasm Inferno via Fluid Pipes. Build in a 3x7x3 configuration. (63 total)
CraftData.Hint: Magma - better than it sounds.

CraftData.Description: Uses pumped Magma to burn out CryoPlasm Spawners within range. Build in a 3x3x3 configuration.
CraftData.Hint: The Inferno needs 15 minutes of burn time with a maximum interruption time of 30 seconds. Good luck.

CraftData.Description: Attach to a Storage Hopper to inject Compressed Freezon into compatible machines.
CraftData.Hint: Look in the handbook for a list of compatible machines and the effects.

CraftData.Description: Uses HEFC to super-charge a modified MK3 Laserturret to create 3x3 vertical shafts extremely quickly. Feed HEFC via attached Storage Hopper. Build in a 3x3x3 shape. (27 in total)
CraftData.Hint: Warning! Dangerous! Ensure it is placed correctly before feeding fuel.

CraftData.Description: Crafts a machine capable of auto-crafting single-use Power Boosters. The Power Booster will give ARTHER power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it..
CraftData.Hint: Remember, Chargers put power into Boosters!

CraftData.Description: Auto-crafts a single-use Power Booster. The Power Booster will give ARTHER power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it..
CraftData.Hint: Remember, Chargers put power into Boosters!

CraftData.Description: Auto-crafts a single-use Power Booster. The Power Booster will give ARTHER power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it..
CraftData.Hint: Remember, Chargers put power into Boosters!

CraftData.Description: Auto-crafts a single-use Power Booster. The Power Booster will give ARTHER power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it..
CraftData.Hint: Remember, Chargers put power into Boosters!

CraftData.Description: Auto-crafts a single-use Power Booster. The Power Booster will give ARTHER power. Place the crafted item into your hotbar to use it..
CraftData.Hint: Remember, Chargers put power into Boosters!

CraftData.Description: Makes clocks, made from crystal
CraftData.Hint: Useful manufacturing component.

CraftData.Description: Overclocks existing Crystal Clocks to a higher frequency, using lots of power to do so.
CraftData.Hint: Useful manufacturing component.

CraftData.Description: Uses precision technology to produce an unfocused lens from any lower-tier of lens. Can then be chrome-plated to be used in Laser Power Transmitters.
CraftData.Hint: Accepts ANY lower-tier lens.

CraftData.Description: Mirror-coats a high-precision unfocused lens to provide a useful upgrade.
CraftData.Hint: Useful manufacturing component.

CraftData.Description: Massive horizontal mining laser used to bore out straight tunnels 5 by 5 meters across. Massive energy demands.
CraftData.Hint: Use to bore out straight tunnels

CraftData.Description: Composites Coal Ore and High Energy Composite Fuel into High Octane Fuel. Build in a 3x3x3 layout.
CraftData.Hint: The resulting fuel is potent enough to launch rockets.

CraftData.Description: The High Orbital Debris Object Reclaimer (or H.O.D.O.R) can be used to knock orbital debris out of the atmosphere for our use. Build in a 3x1x3 configuration.
CraftData.Hint: Ensure sky clearance. Like really. REALLY you want sky clearance. I mean it. Big baddaboom.

CraftData.Description: This 9x9x9 machine will automatically digistruct a 1 kilometre track. WHEN BUILT IT CANNOT BE REMOVED. THINK VERY CAREFULLY BEFORE BUILDING. 729 needed in total. Direction is pre-determined due to orbital rotation of the planet.
CraftData.Hint: The launch area is 9x9x1000. This is not a typo.

CraftData.Description: Connects Rooms to Airlocks
CraftData.Hint: Build in a 3x3x1 or 1x3x3 layout

CraftData.Description: Connects Airlocks to the Outside
CraftData.Hint: Build in a 3x3x1 or 1x3x3 layout

CraftData.Description: Place in a Room and follow the instructions.
CraftData.Hint: Build it on the floor. Instructions are in the bottom left once you do!

CraftData.Description: Place in a Room to offset the effects of extreme Cold.
CraftData.Hint: Examine the Room Controller for your Room's current rating.

CraftData.Description: Place in a Room to offset the effects of extreme Heat
CraftData.Hint: Examine the Room Controller for your Room's current rating.

CraftData.Description: Place in a Room to increase the growth rate of Plants
CraftData.Hint: Examine the Room Controller for your Room's current rating.

CraftData.Description: Conveyors transfer items through this.
CraftData.Hint: Conveyor->Grommet->Any receiving machine

CraftData.Description: PTGs, Solar Panels and PSBs will transfer power through this.
CraftData.Hint: PSB -> Grommet -> Any receiving machine

CraftData.Description: Paintable, reinforced wall, specifically designed for Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Uses Paste - you'll lose Paste if you dig it up, so place with care!

CraftData.Description: Paintable, reinforced wall, specifically designed for Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Uses Paste - you'll lose Paste if you dig it up, so place with care!

CraftData.Description: Paintable, reinforced floor, specifically designed for Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Uses Paste - you'll lose Paste if you dig it up, so place with care!

CraftData.Description: Reinforced wall decoration, specifically designed for Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Uses Paste - you'll lose Paste if you dig it up, so place with care!

CraftData.Description: Reinforced ceiling reflector, specifically designed for Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Uses Paste - you'll lose Paste if you dig it up, so place with care!

CraftData.Description: Paintable, reinforced wall, specifically designed for Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Uses Paste - you'll lose Paste if you dig it up, so place with care!

CraftData.Description: Future machine - use this to improve the Clean rating of your room, required to hit Clean Room designation.
CraftData.Hint: Clean room has no current effect.

CraftData.Description: Future machine - use this to improve the BioFilter rating of your room, allowing you to easily survive under Toxic Conditions.
CraftData.Hint: Works effectively in the Toxic Caverns.

CraftData.Description: Place Plant Seeds onto these to grow them.
CraftData.Hint: Grows plants much faster.

CraftData.Description: Place Plant Seeds onto these to grow them.
CraftData.Hint: Grows plants much faster.

CraftData.Description: Paintable, light that only works in Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Uses Paste - you'll lose Paste if you dig it up, so place with care!

CraftData.Description: Paintable, light that only works in Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Dapper DLC Pack

CraftData.Description: Paintable, light that only works in Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Dapper DLC Pack

CraftData.Description: Paintable, light that only works in Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Dapper DLC Pack

CraftData.Description: Paintable, light that only works in Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Dapper DLC Pack

CraftData.Description: This Room light will alert you to CPH attacks silently.
CraftData.Hint: Uses Paste - you'll lose Paste if you dig it up, so place with care!

CraftData.Description: Paintable, light that only works in Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Dapper DLC Pack

CraftData.Description: Paintable, light that only works in Rooms.
CraftData.Hint: Requires the Dapper DLC Pack

CraftData.Description: A filterable, real-time graph monitoring every aspect of your base's performance.
CraftData.Hint: Place in a room. Observe. Learn. Progress!

CraftData.Description: Place on a wall in a room, give it power, and stand near it to heal.
CraftData.Hint: No hint.

CraftData.Description: Place on a room to make dying more convenient.
CraftData.Hint: Build in a 1x3x1 layout, using 3 in total.

CraftData.Description: Use to craft and upgrade Ampules into an attached Ampule Crafter
CraftData.Hint: Carry one. ALWAYS carry one. (Put into suit inventory to fire automatically)

CraftData.Description: Use to craft and upgrade Ampules from an attached Ampule Crafter
CraftData.Hint: Carry one. ALWAYS carry one. (Put into suit inventory to fire automatically)
